data.name: Furry Feet +18 Bare Feet Patch
data.detailed_description:
Unleash the power of paws, downloading this DLC unlocks explicit content for the base game.

- 4 New spicy levels added.

- Of which 2 are special levels that includes two furry gals in spicy poses.

Explicit content is unlocked on the gallery, clicking the feet button toggles clothing.
data.about_the_game:
Unleash the power of paws, downloading this DLC unlocks explicit content for the base game.

- 4 New spicy levels added.

data.supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, French, German
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
-Includes Nudity and Sexual content.
-Not suitable for watching at work
-Not suitable for all ages
-All characters in the game are over 18 years old.
